Capivara.AI is a platform aimed at creating content about Natural Language Processing (NLP). Our goal is to develop open-source NLP projects ― including applications, frameworks, video lessons, and tutorials ― to facilitate and encourage works in the area.

There will be more information soon! If you are interested in the project, contact us.

This project is maintained by capivara-ai
